name: Hidden Object Game
description:
GET THE BEST HIDDEN OBJECT GAME ON APPSTORE!
Can you find all the Hidden Objects?

The Addictive Game is here in APPSTORE enjoy playing. Play the modes that you love

GAME FEATURES:
-Hidden Object scenes change every time you play!
-Hundreds of items to find and collect!
-Tons of game modes! Easy, Icons, and more!
-Obtain high scores!
-No Internet connection required to play!
-FREE hidden object game!
-High resolution graphics!
